description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Driven mad after losing his farm to foreclosure, local turkey farmer J. Snydles plots his revenge on an unsuspecting town.  Using steroids, toxic waste, and a small amount of energy drink, Snydles concocts a brew that turns his turkeys into mindless minions.  On the brink of panic, returning war hero Bret Star must save his town before it's too late.  Zombie Turkeys Must Die!!
description.short: Driven mad after losing his farm to foreclosure, local turkey farmer J. Snydles plots his revenge on an unsuspecting town.  Using steroids, toxic waste, and a small amount of energy drink, Snydles concocts a brew that turns his turkeys into mindless minions.  On the brink of panic, returning war hero Bret Star must save his town before it's too late.  Zombie Turkeys Must Die!!
